channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
Hello, I am new to Moparscape, but I have spent a bit of time searching and reading as much as I can. I have a pretty good idea about the differences from clients and servers.
When I try to get on to a 508 server from Moparscape, everything still looks 317ish, or whatever version Hybridscape is. If I download the server (or source? I don't really understand that bit yet) I am trying to connect to, will that fix my problem?
I am using the Moparscape linux client, and I am under the assumption that I need to change something with Moparscape to fix my problem. So, sorry if I posted this in the wrong section.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Hmm, there are heaps of servers. I guess, DeltaScape is one of them I’m not really good at naming lots of servers that work with MoparScape 3.2

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Dankstah Dankstah
item.description:
@Dankstah wrote:

Well running linux, Moparscape is the only client I’ve found that I can run… So instead of making a new thread, I would like to ask here: What is a good 317 server that works with the Moparscape client? (Most of the servers I’ve checked out require the use of their server)

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

There are clients not made by Moparisthebest, not an official MoparScape client. You should use the search button and search for a ‘508 IP Changer client’ check out some results. If you wish to play most servers you will need to download a client from a link that is given, or use a web client from a link that may have been given.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Dankstah Dankstah
item.description:
@Dankstah wrote:

Hmm, that’s odd. I had no idea there was different moperscape clients. I just downloaded the 3.2 by following the “download moparscape” link at the top of the page. I’ll do some more searching then.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I believe this is the wrong section, and you will not be able to connect to a “508” server using the 317 MoparScape Client. You will have to download a 508 client.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Dankstah Dankstah
item.description:
@Dankstah wrote:

Hello, I am new to Moparscape, but I have spent a bit of time searching and reading as much as I can. I have a pretty good idea about the differences from clients and servers.

When I try to get on to a 508 server from Moparscape, everything still looks 317ish, or whatever version Hybridscape is. If I download the server (or source? I don’t really understand that bit yet) I am trying to connect to, will that fix my problem?

I am using the Moparscape linux client, and I am under the assumption that I need to change something with Moparscape to fix my problem. So, sorry if I posted this in the wrong section.
